snippet: HARDY--Paige Ethington. You were our shining light. Our hearts go out to Tripp and your amazing five children: Basil, Bennett, Tate, Ivy and Byron. We will always love you and will remember your hilarious wit, kind heart, megawatt smile and unbelievable friendship over the years. The Group 6 Episcopal Moms Breakfast Club 1/3
lead_paragraph: HARDY--Paige Ethington. You were our shining light. Our hearts go out to Tripp and your amazing five children: Basil, Bennett, Tate, Ivy and Byron. We will always love you and will remember your hilarious wit, kind heart, megawatt smile and unbelievable friendship over the years. The Group 6 Episcopal Moms Breakfast Club 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HARDY, PAIGE ETHINGTON
